messages.subject: Jules Brunet Book/Hakodate
messages.msgSnippet: from Hakodate no bakumatsu ishin; Furansu shikan Buryune no suketchi 100-mai publisher: Tokyo chuo Koronsha Showa 63 [1988] isbn 4120016994 *wounds please
messages.messageBody:
from Hakodate no bakumatsu ishin; Furansu shikan Buryune no suketchi
100-mai
publisher: Tokyo chuo Koronsha Showa 63 [1988]
isbn 4120016994

*wounds please include this book in the database and incorporate the
following files into your streamload account...you may want to name
them "Jules Brunet General" and "Jules Brunet Hakodate"

General drawings and text by Jules Brunet
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/JB.zip

**HAKODATE** related art + COLOR photos of artifacts
and yes Hijikata's name shows up on an organizational chart and in
the text all over the place, and in a caption of a pic showing alot
of things being blown up by cannons
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/JBHakodate.zip

[if for some reason my university hosting fails or runs out please
wait until wounds has a chance to place the files into streamload]

Jules Brunet happens to be a very good artist (pencil, watercolor
mostly)...the photos in the book are very interesting as well
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/sphinxretainers.jpg
perhaps they forgot their hats at home...
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/hats.jpg
*there is also a pic of a very handsome samurai, very well
photographed in complete travel clothes + hat...just look in the zip
files

If you have forgotten who Jules Brunet is already and how he is
significant in our study please read
http://p076.ezboard.com/fshinsengumiheadquartersfrm17.showMessage?
topicID=67.topic
Glamour shot LOL!!! (^_^)
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/JB.jpg

secretarytocapt3
